data.title: Some Descendants of the CAPET1 Family Related to George Washington 1st US President
data.text:
Some Descendants of

Phillip I 'the Fair' CAPET,

King of France [1060-1108]

(1052 - 1108)

Click HERE to See how George Washington 1st US President's Family are Related to this Person.

(Persons with names shown in Green are Direct Ancestors of George Washington 1st US President)

(Persons with names in RED are Especially Notable Direct Ancestors of George Washington 1st US President).

Copyright 2007 by Terry J. Booth. All reproduction or reuse is prohibited, in whole or in part, without written permission of the author.

The author has relied much on those herein cited. Please contact the author about an important source not cited or improperly cited.

First Generation

1. Phillip I 'the Fair' CAPET King of France [1060-1108] (See Link for Ancestry) [1060-1108], son of Henry I 'Capet' DE FRANCE King of France [1031-1060] and Agnesa Yaroslavna 'Anna' Of KIEV, was born before 23 May 1052 in Reims, Marne, Champagne, France,584 1532 died 29 Jul 1108 in Meulan, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France,584 1444 1532 1533 and was buried in Abbaye St-Benoit-sur-Loire, Loiret, Orleanais/Centre, France. Another name for Phillip was Philip I "The Fair" DE FRANCE.584 1444 1532 1533 Phillip married Bertha Of HOLLAND about 1072.1444 1533 Bertha was born about 1055 in Vlaardingen, Holland and died about 1094 in Montreuil-sur-Mer, Artois/Pas-de-Calais, France about age 39.

The Child from this marriage was:

2. i. Louis VI 'the Fat' CAPET King of France [1108-1137] was born about 1081 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 584 and died 1 Aug 1137 in Chateau Bethizy, Paris, Ile-de-France, France 584 about age 56.

Phillip next married Bertrade 'Beatrice' DE MONTFORT (See Link for Ancestry),795 1532 1535 daughter of Simon I DE MONTFORT Seigneur de Montfort and Agnes 'd'Evreux' DE NORMANDY, in 1093 in Scandalous--Bertrada was married to another.1532 1534 Bertrade was born circa 1073 in Montfort-l'Amaury, Yvelines, Ile-de-France, France and died 14 Feb 1117 in Fontevrauld l'Abbaye, Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France 1535 at age 44.

The Child from this marriage was:

3. i. Fluery DE FRANCE Prince de France 1536 was born circa 1094 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France and died circa 1119 in Normandy, France (in battle) 1536 at age 25.

Second Generation

2. Louis VI 'the Fat' CAPET King of France [1108-1137] (Phillip I 'the Fair' King of France [1060-1108] 1) was born about 1081 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 584 and died 1 Aug 1137 in Chateau Bethizy, Paris, Ile-de-France, France 584 about age 56. Another name for Louis was Louis VI "the_Fat" DE FRANCE.584 Louis married Adelaide DE SAVOIE (See Link for Ancestry), daughter of Humbert II DE SAVOIE Comte de Savoie and Maurienne and Gisela DE BURGUNDY, about Apr 1115. Adelaide was born about 1092 in Maurienne, Savoie, Rhone-Alpes, France and died 18 Nov 1154 about age 62.

Children from this marriage were:

4. i. Louis VII 'the Younger' CAPET King of France [1137-1180] was born about 1120 in Reims, Marne, Champagne, France,68 1442 1443 died 18 Sep 1180 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 68 1442 1443 1444 about age 60, and was buried in Notre-Dame-de-Barbeau, Fontainbleau, France.68

5. ii. Pierre 'Capet' DE FRANCE Seigneur de Courtenay 1537 1538 was born about 1130 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 1538 and died about 1183 on Crusade in Palestine 1538 about age 53.

Third Generation

4. Louis VII 'the Younger' CAPET King of France [1137-1180] (Louis VI 'the Fat' King of France [1108-1137] 2, Phillip I 'the Fair' King of France [1060-1108] 1) was born about 1120 in Reims, Marne, Champagne, France,68 1442 1443 died 18 Sep 1180 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 68 1442 1443 1444 about age 60, and was buried in Notre-Dame-de-Barbeau, Fontainbleau, France.68 Another name for Louis was Louis VII "the_Younger" DE FRANCE.68 1442 1445 1446 Louis married Eleanor Of AQUITAINE Queen of France (See Link for Ancestry),68 1447 1448 1449 1450 1451 daughter of William VIII DE POITOU 10th Duc d'Aquitane, Comte de Poitou and Eleanor DE CHATELLERAULT, 22 Jul 1137 in Bordeaux, Gironde, France - but divorced in 1152.68 1443 Eleanor was born in 1123 in Chateau de Belin-Beliet, Gironde, Aquitaine, France,68 1452 1453 died 31 Mar 1204 in Fontevraud-L'abbaye, Touraine, France 68 1452 1453 at age 81, and was buried in Fontevrauld l'Abbaye, Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France.68 Another name for Eleanor was Eleanor DE POITOU.68

See the Louis VII 'the Younger' CAPET King of France [1137-1180] Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

Louis next married Constance Bourgogne DE CASTILE (See Link for Ancestry),68 1443 1455 daughter of Alfonso VII "the_Emperor" DE CASTILE King of Castile and Leon [1135-1157] and Berenguela DE BARCELONA, between 1153 and 1154 in Orleans, Loiret, Orleanais/Centre, France.68 1443 1455 Constance was born about 1144 in Castile, Castile, Spain,68 died 4 Oct 1160 in Died during childirth in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 68 1443 1455 about age 16, and was buried in St. Denis Basilica, Paris, Ile-de-France, France.68 See the Louis VII 'the Younger' CAPET King of France [1137-1180] Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

Louis next married Adelaide 'Alix' DE BLOIS (See Link for Ancestry), daughter of Theobald IV DE BLOIS Comte de Blois and Champagne and Mathilde 'Maud' Of CARINTHIA, 18 Oct 1160 in Prob France.68 1443 1444 Adelaide was born about 1140 in Blois, Loir-et-Cher, Orleanais/Centre, France,68 1443 died 4 Jun 1206 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 68 1443 1444 about age 66, and was buried in Abbaye de Potigny, Calvados, Normandy, France.68 Another name for Adelaide was Adelaide "Alix" DE CHAMPAGNE.68 1442 1444 1464

See the Louis VII 'the Younger' CAPET King of France [1137-1180] Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

5. Pierre 'Capet' DE FRANCE Seigneur de Courtenay 1537 1538 (Louis VI 'the Fat' King of France [1108-1137] 2, Phillip I 'the Fair' King of France [1060-1108] 1) was born about 1130 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France 1538 and died about 1183 on Crusade in Palestine 1538 about age 53. Another name for Pierre was Pierre CAPET Comte de Courtenay. Pierre married Elizabeth 'Isabel' DE COURTENAY 1538 after 1150.1538 Elizabeth was born circa 1130 in Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France 1538 and died after 1205 of Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France.1538

Children from this marriage were:

6. i. Pierre 'Capet' DE COURTENAY Comte de Courtenay, Emperor Elect of Byzantium was born about 1155 in Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France and died before Jan 1218 in Killed while traveling to Constantinople to become Emperor of Byzantium. Another name for Pierre was Pierre 'Capet' DE FRANCE.

7. ii. Alice DE COURTENAY 1537 1539 was born circa 1165 in Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France and died 14 Sep 1205 in France 1540 at age 40.

8. iii. Robert I DE COURTENAY Seigneur de Champignelles 2 was born about 1168 in Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France and died about 1239 in Died on Crusade in Palestine 2 about age 71.

Fourth Generation

7. Alice DE COURTENAY 1537 1539 (Pierre 'Capet' DE Seigneur de Courtenay 3, Louis VI 'the Fat' King of France [1108-1137] 2, Phillip I 'the Fair' King of France [1060-1108] 1) was born circa 1165 in Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France and died 14 Sep 1205 in France 1540 at age 40. Alice married Aymer III Taillefer DE ANGOULEME Comte d'Angouleme (See Link for Ancestry),1537 1539 son of Guillaume V Taillefer DE ANGOULEME Comte d'Angouleme and Marguerite DE TURENNE, about Apr 1186.1537 1539 Aymer was born about 1160 in Angouleme, Charente, Aquitane, France and died 16 Jul 1202 in Limoges, Haute-Vienne, Limousin, France 1539 about age 42.

The Child from this marriage was:

9. i. Isabella Taillefer DE ANGOULEME 792 795 1373 1403 1404 was born about 1188 in Angouleme, Charente, Aquitane, France,792 died 31 May 1246 in As a Nun in Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France 792 about age 58, and was buried in Fontevrauld l'Abbaye, Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France.792

8. Robert I DE COURTENAY Seigneur de Champignelles 2 (Pierre 'Capet' DE Seigneur de Courtenay 3, Louis VI 'the Fat' King of France [1108-1137] 2, Phillip I 'the Fair' King of France [1060-1108] 1) was born about 1168 in Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France and died about 1239 in Died on Crusade in Palestine 2 about age 71. Robert married Mahaut DE MEHUN 2 about 1216.2 Mahaut was born about 1190 in Mehun-sur-Yevre, Cher, Berry/Centre, France and died about 1240 of Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France 2 about age 50.

The Child from this marriage was:

10. i. Pierre DE COURTENAY 2 was born about 1218 in Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France 2 and died 8 Feb 1250 in Conches, Eure, Normandy, France 2 about age 32. Pierre married Pernell DE JOIGNY 2 before 1250.2 Pernell was born circa 1230 in Joigny, Yonne, Bourgogne, France and died about 1282 of Courtenay, Loiret, Gatinais/Centre, France 2 about age 52.

Fifth Generation

9. Isabella Taillefer DE ANGOULEME 792 795 1373 1403 1404 (Alice DE COURTENAY 4, Pierre 'Capet' DE Seigneur de Courtenay 3, Louis VI 'the Fat' King of France [1108-1137] 2, Phillip I 'the Fair' King of France [1060-1108] 1) was born about 1188 in Angouleme, Charente, Aquitane, France,792 died 31 May 1246 in As a Nun in Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France 792 about age 58, and was buried in Fontevrauld l'Abbaye, Fontevraud, Maine/Pays-de-la-Loire, France.792 Isabella married John I 'Lackland' 'Plantagenet' Of ENGLAND King of England [1199-121 (See Link for Ancestry) [1199-1216],791 792 793 794 795 son of Henry II 'Curt Mantel' 'Plantagenet' Of ENGLAND King of England [1154-1189] and Eleanor Of AQUITAINE Queen of France, 24 Aug 1200 in Bordeaux, Gironde, Aquitaine, France.792 795 John was born 24 Dec 1166 in Kings Manor House, Oxford, Oxfordshire, England,792 died 19 Oct 1216 in Newark Castle, Nottinghamshire, England 792 at age 49, and was buried in Worcester Cathedral, Worcestershire, England.792 See the John I 'Lackland' 'Plantagenet' Of ENGLAND King of England [1199-121 Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.

Isabella next married (Lord) Hugh X 'le Brun' DE LUSIGNAN 10 May 1220 in England. Hugh was born about 1183 in Lusignan, Vienne, Poitou, France and died 6 Jun 1246 in Surrey, England about age 63.

Children from this marriage were:

11. i. Hugh XI DE LUSIGNAN Lord of Lusignan was born in 1221 in Lusignan, Vienne, Poitou, France and died in 1250 in Battle Of Mansurah, Nile Delta, Egypt at age 29.

12. ii. Guy DE LUSIGNAN Lord of Cognac was born about 1222 in Lusignan, Vienne, Poitou, France and died 14 May 1264 in Lewes, Sussex, England about age 42.

13. iii. Alice DE LUSIGNAN 821 1368 1369 1370 was born about 1224 in Lusignan, Vienne, Poitou, France, died 9 Feb 1256 in Warren, Sussex, England about age 32, and was buried before The High Altar, Lewes Priory, Sussex, England.

14. iv. (Lord) Geoffrey DE LUSIGNAN Of Jarnac was born in 1224 in Lusignan, Vienne, Poitou, France and died before 1275.

15. v. (Lord) William DE LUSIGNAN Earl Of Pembroke was born after 1225 in Pembroke, Pembrokeshire, England and died before 18 May 1296 in Battle In France.

16. vi. Aymer 'de Lusignan' DE VALENCE Bishop of Winchester was born about 1228 in Lusignan, Vienne, Poitou, France and died 4 Dec 1260 in Paris, Seine, Ile-de-France, France about age 32. Another name for Aymer was Aymer DE LUSIGNAN.

Sixth Generation

13. Alice DE LUSIGNAN 821 1368 1369 1370 (Isabella Taillefer DE ANGOULEME 5, Alice DE COURTENAY 4, Pierre 'Capet' DE Seigneur de Courtenay 3, Louis VI 'the Fat' King of France [1108-1137] 2, Phillip I 'the Fair' King of France [1060-1108] 1) was born about 1224 in Lusignan, Vienne, Poitou, France, died 9 Feb 1256 in Warren, Sussex, England about age 32, and was buried before The High Altar, Lewes Priory, Sussex, England. Alice married John DE WARENNE Earl Of Surrey (See Link for Ancestry),821 1367 1368 son of MCAdvisor_William DE WARENNE Earl Of Surrey and Maud MARSHALL, in Aug 1247 in Woodstock, Kent, England. John was born after Aug 1231 in Warren, Sussex, England, died after Sep 1304 in Kennington, Surrey, England, and was buried in Lewes Priory, Sussex, England. See the John DE WARENNE Earl Of Surrey Entry for this Couple's Children and Descendants.
